verses.verse: Run ye to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> through the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H3045>know,<s%> and <S%H1245>seek<s%> in the broad <S%H7339>places<s%> thereof, <S%H518>if<s%> ye can <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> there <S%H3426>be<s%> any that <S%H6213>executeth<s%> <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> that <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> the <S%H530>truth;<s%> and I will <S%H5545>pardon<s%> it.
And <S%H518>though<s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth;<s%> <S%H3651>surely<s%> they <S%H7650>swear<s%> <S%H8267>falsely.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon the <S%H530>truth?<s%> thou hast <S%H5221>stricken<s%> them, but they have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2342>grieved;<s%> thou hast <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them, but they have <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>correction:<s%> they have made their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H2388>harder<s%> than a <S%H4480>rock;<s%> <S%H5553><s%> they have <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7725>return.<s%>

Therefore <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H1992>these<s%> are <S%H1800>poor;<s%> they are <S%H2973>foolish:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> nor the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of their <S%H430>God.<s%>

I will <S%H1980>get<s%> me <S%H413>unto<s%> the great <S%H1419>men,<s%> and will speak <S%H1696>unto<s%> them; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> have <S%H3045>known<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of their <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H389>but<s%> <S%H1992>these<s%> have <S%H3162>altogether<s%> <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke,<s%> and <S%H5423>burst<s%> the <S%H4147>bonds.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> out of the <S%H4480>forest<s%> <S%H3293><s%> shall <S%H5221>slay<s%> them, and a <S%H2061>wolf<s%> of the <S%H6160>evenings<s%> shall <S%H7703>spoil<s%> them, a <S%H5246>leopard<s%> shall <S%H8245>watch<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H5892>cities:<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> that goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H2007><s%> shall be torn in <S%H2963>pieces:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H7231>many,<s%> and their <S%H4878>backslidings<s%> are <S%H6105>increased.<s%>

How <S%H335><s%> shall I <S%H5545>pardon<s%> thee for <S%H2063>this?<s%> thy <S%H1121>children<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by them that are <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H430>gods:<s%> when I had fed them to the <S%H7646>full,<s%> <S%H853><s%> they then committed <S%H5003>adultery,<s%> and assembled <S%H1413>themselves<s%> by troops in the <S%H2181>harlots<s%> <S%H1004>houses.<s%>
They <S%H1961>were<s%> as <S%H2109>fed<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> in the <S%H7904>morning:<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H6670>neighed<s%> <S%H413>after<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife.<s%>

Shall I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things? <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H518>and<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on <S%H834>such<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> as <S%H2088>this?<s%>

Go ye <S%H5927>up<s%> upon her <S%H8284>walls,<s%> and <S%H7843>destroy;<s%> but <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> a full <S%H3617>end:<s%> take <S%H5493>away<s%> her <S%H5189>battlements;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have dealt very <S%H898>treacherously<s%> <S%H898><s%> against me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

They have <S%H3584>belied<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1931>he;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> us; <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall we <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> nor famine: <S%H7458><s%>
And the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and the <S%H1699>word<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> in them: <S%H3541>thus<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> unto them.

Wherefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> ye <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>make<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> in thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> them.

Lo, <S%H2009><s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you from <S%H4480>far,<s%> <S%H4801><s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H386>mighty<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is an <S%H4480>ancient<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> whose <S%H3956>language<s%> thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8085>understandest<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> they <S%H1696>say.<s%>
Their <S%H827>quiver<s%> is as an <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6913>sepulcher,<s%> they are <S%H3605>all<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men.<s%>

And they shall eat <S%H398>up<s%> thine <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> and thy <S%H3899>bread,<s%> which thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> should <S%H398>eat:<s%> they shall eat <S%H398>up<s%> thy <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and thine <S%H1241>herds:<s%> they shall eat <S%H398>up<s%> thy <S%H1612>vines<s%> and thy fig <S%H8384>trees:<s%> they shall <S%H7567>impoverish<s%> thy <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H982>trustedst,<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
Nevertheless <S%H1571><s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3617>end<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you.

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> ye shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8478>Wherefore<s%> <S%H4100><s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things unto us? then shalt thou <S%H559>answer<s%> <S%H413><s%> them, <S%H834>Like<s%> as ye have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> in your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall ye <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> in a <S%H776>land<s%> that is <S%H3808>not<s%> yours.
Declare <S%H5046><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H8085>publish<s%> it in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> O <S%H5530>foolish<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H3820>understanding;<s%> which have <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3808>not;<s%> which have <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> not: <S%H3808><s%>

Fear <S%H3372><s%> ye <S%H3808>not<s%> me? <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> will ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2342>tremble<s%> at my <S%H4480>presence,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H2344>sand<s%> for the <S%H1366>bound<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2706>decree,<s%> that it <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> it: and though the <S%H1530>waves<s%> thereof toss <S%H1607>themselves,<s%> yet can they <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3201>prevail;<s%> though they <S%H1993>roar,<s%> yet can they <S%H3808>not<s%> pass <S%H5674>over<s%> it?
But <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1961>hath<s%> a <S%H5637>revolting<s%> and a <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> they are <S%H5493>revolted<s%> and <S%H1980>gone.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> <S%H559>say<s%> they in their <S%H3824>heart,<s%> Let us <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H1653>rain,<s%> both the <S%H3138>former<s%> and the <S%H4456>latter,<s%> in his <S%H6256>season:<s%> he <S%H8104>reserveth<s%> unto us the <S%H2708>appointed<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> of the <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>
Your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have turned <S%H5186>away<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things, and your <S%H2403>sins<s%> have <S%H4513>withheld<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> things <S%H4480>from<s%> you.

For <S%H3588><s%> among my <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> men: they lay <S%H7789>wait,<s%> as he that <S%H7918>setteth<s%> <S%H3353>snares;<s%> they <S%H5324>set<s%> a <S%H4889>trap,<s%> they <S%H3920>catch<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

As a <S%H3619>cage<s%> is <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5775>birds,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> are their <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they are become <S%H1431>great,<s%> and waxen <S%H6238>rich.<s%>

They are waxen <S%H8080>fat,<s%> they <S%H6245>shine:<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> they <S%H5674>overpass<s%> the <S%H1697>deeds<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked:<s%> they <S%H1777>judge<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H1779>cause,<s%> the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> yet they <S%H6743>prosper;<s%> and the <S%H4941>right<s%> of the <S%H34>needy<s%> do they <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8199>judge.<s%>

Shall I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things? <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on <S%H834>such<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> as <S%H2088>this?<s%>
A <S%H8047>wonderful<s%> and horrible <S%H8186>thing<s%> is <S%H1961>committed<s%> in the <S%H776>land;<s%>

The <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> bear <S%H7287>rule<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> their <S%H3027>means;<s%> and my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> to have it <S%H3651>so:<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> will ye <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H319>end<s%> thereof?
